item.title: Keto Mousse
item.description: How to make KETO Mousse INGREDIENTS: 1-1/2 cup heavy whipping cream 2-3 tbsp un-sweated cocoa powder 3 tbsp keto powder sugar (think swerve) 1 tsp vanilla extract pinch of salt INSTRUCTIONS: Combine all ingredients & whisk to whip to fluffy texture. Store in fridge.
